name: Richard Starkey
message: As we close this week out, I want to recognize the incredible work happening across the entire JDI team. A big win came from the Finance Team getting our financial packets in order and moving conversations forward with partners. Grateful for this team and excited for what’s ahead.

name: Louis Atouguia
message: Wins like this are only possible because of the dedication of supporting staff across compliance, admin, and operations—thank you for keeping the machine turning day in and day out.

name: Amanda Lee
message: Delivered a complex proposal under a tight deadline while coordinating across three time zones. Outstanding ownership and communication.

name: Ryan Chen
message: Proactively documented the integration handoff so the next project could start smoothly—great enablement for the whole team.

name: Priya Nair
message: Jumped in to unblock a customer deployment and stayed late to ensure a clean cutover. Customer called it out as “exceptional support.”

name: Jason Miller
message: Introduced a lightweight QA checklist that reduced regressions by 30% this week. Nice measurable impact!
